level.heading: Application for a tasting permit for a class A licensee.
level.text: The application for issuance or renewal of a tasting permit for off-premises retailer's license, class A, shall include:
A copy of the applicant's off-premises's retailers license, class A;
Drawings of the premises indicating the areas where sampling is to occur; and
The hours and days during which the tasting is to occur.

level.heading: HISTORICAL AND STATUTORY NOTES
level.text: D.C. Law 13-298 amended and enacted into law Title 25 of the District of Columbia Official Code.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.
